name: Winter Bundle (ENG)
description:
A DELUXE Bundle by Roll&PlayMedusa.

Get  "Snowball Tactics" and "Mountain Ski" Deluxe Version now in this Sale Bundle.

Age: 7+


Winter is here! The usual sounds in town, quite quiet already, are now cushioned by snow.

Cold air freezes your nostrils, but it has that comfortable fireplace and tangerine smell you like so much. Your coat, your mittens, your gumboots… everything is ready to play in the par WHAT? Someone threw you a snowball! You know what it means, right, it’s a SNOWBALL FIGHT!

Winter is already here! It's time to put your gloves on, adjust your sunglasses and ski down the mountain at full speed!

In “Mountain Ski” you will feel the adrenaline of throwing yourself down the slope, the cold wind in the face and the frenzy of competing with your friends for the first place.
